name: Bibarel
description: The Beaver Pokémon. It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

abilities.name: Simple
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you may double this Pokémon's Move modifier for a single attack or damage roll.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.description: When this Pokémon attacks an opponent, it ignores any stat changes the opponent has been affected with after the start of battle.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: At the end of each long rest, this Pokémon rerolls on the nature table, replacing its nature with the result until the next long rest.
